Functions¶

im_load.load_tiff(fn, path=None)¶

load tiff image

Example¶

In [1]: from im_load import load_tiff

In [2]: import numpy as np

In [3]: import os,glob

In [4]: import warnings

In [5]: warnings.simplefilter("ignore")

In [6]: path = os.path.abspath('../../code_sample/code')

In [7]: os.chdir(path)

In [8]: fn = glob.glob('*.tif')[0]

In [9]: img = load_tiff(fn).im

In [10]: from exp_param import ExpConfig

In [11]: dexp = ExpConfig(im_x = img.shape[1],
   ....:                  im_y = img.shape[0],
   ....:                  center_x = 715.09,
   ....:                  center_y = 914.08,
   ....:                  wavelength = 1.24,
   ....:                  pixel_size = 172,
   ....:                  detector_distance = 2.03,
   ....:                  )
   ....: 

In [12]: from data_reduction import proc

In [13]: d = proc(img,dexp)

In [14]: q = np.linspace(0.001,0.2,300)

In [15]: d1d = d.data1d(q)

In [16]: from data_visual import data_show

In [17]: show = data_show(d,dexp)

In [18]: show.show2D(vmax = 10000)

In [19]: show.show1D(q)
